name: MatrixBarcodeEncoder
summary: Encodes 2D barcode symbologies into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: Encode
methods.summary: Encodes a 2D barcode using the specified CodeGlyphX.BarcodeType.

methods.name: EncodeKix
methods.summary: Encodes a KIX code into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodePharmacodeTwoTrack
methods.summary: Encodes a Pharmacode (two-track) barcode into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodePostnet
methods.summary: Encodes a POSTNET symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodePlanet
methods.summary: Encodes a PLANET symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeRoyalMail4State
methods.summary: Encodes a Royal Mail 4-State Customer Code (RM4SCC) symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeAustraliaPost
methods.summary: Encodes an Australia Post customer barcode into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeJapanPost
methods.summary: Encodes a Japan Post barcode into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeUspsImb
methods.summary: Encodes a USPS Intelligent Mail Barcode (IMB) into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeGs1DataBarOmni
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1 DataBar-14 Omnidirectional symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeGs1DataBarStacked
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1 DataBar-14 Stacked symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeGs1DataBarExpandedStacked
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1 DataBar Expanded Stacked symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeDataMatrix
methods.summary: Encodes a Data Matrix symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodePdf417
methods.summary: Encodes a PDF417 symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.

methods.name: EncodeMicroPdf417
methods.summary: Encodes a MicroPDF417 symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.
